comments.author: Michael Busch
comments.body:
2.1.0 release artifacts (core & contribs) are available at http://mirrors.ibiblio.org/pub/mirrors/maven2/org/apache/lucene/.

Please reopen issue if you find any problems with those artifacts.

description:
Please uploaded Lucene (specifically lucene-core) 2.1.0 to ibiblio. I see 2.0.0 but not 2.1.0.

Thanks!
